name: GN Infotech Private Limited
description: Genfotech was founed in 2004 as a web design and e-commerce development company with excellence in delivering cutting-edge website design, web development, SEO, SEM, CRO, and mobile app development services to customers worldwide. From PHP, .NET, and Java programming to Android and iOS mobile app development to ERP and CRM, we have served all industry verticals. Our customers range from one man start-ups to Fortune 500 companies.
